result.reason: Index out of range in DockPaneStripNG.cs tab collection access — Tabs[index] accessed without bounds check in GetOutline_Document/ToolWindow and GetTabRectangle methods, with race condition possible when tabs are closed during rendering.
result.approach: Add bounds guard (index < 0 || index >= Tabs.Count → return null/empty) in GetOutline_Document, GetOutline_ToolWindow, GetTabRectangle_Document, GetTabRectangle_ToolWindow, and validate m_startDisplayingTab against Tabs.Count in CalculateTabs_Document
